## Completeness

**Sessions completed:**
- [ ] Session 1: User Journey
- [ ] Session 2: Product Strategy
- [ ] Session 3: Tech Stack
- [ ] Session 4: Strategy (Mission, Metrics, Monetization, Architecture)
- [ ] Session 5: Brand Strategy
- [ ] Session 6: Design System
- [ ] Session 7: Database Schema
- [ ] Session 8: API Contracts
- [ ] Session 9: Test Strategy
- [ ] Session 10: Backlog
- [ ] Session 11: GitHub Issues (optional)
- [ ] Session 12: Project Scaffold (optional)
- [ ] Session 13: Deployment Plan (optional)
- [ ] Session 14: Observability (optional)

**Post-cascade extensions (optional):**
- [ ] Session 15: Brand Naming
- [ ] Session 16: Messaging
- [ ] Session 17: Brand Identity
- [ ] Session 18: Content Guidelines
- [ ] Session 19: UX Design
- [ ] Session 20: Analytics
- [ ] Session 21: Growth Strategy
- [ ] Session 22: Financial Model

**Minimum for submission:** Sessions 1-10

## Example Structure

**Directory structure:**
```
examples/[your-product-name]/
├── README.md (overview)
├── foundation/
│   ├── 00-user-journey.md
│   ├── 01-mission.md
│   ├── 02-metrics.md
│   └── 03-monetization.md
├── stack/
│   ├── 04-tech-stack.md
│   └── 05-architecture.md
├── design/
│   └── 06-design-system.md
├── database/
│   └── 07-database-schema.md
├── api-contracts/
│   └── 08-api-contracts.md
├── testing/
│   └── 09-test-strategy.md
└── backlog/
    ├── P0-*.md
    ├── P1-*.md
    └── P2-*.md
```

## Quality Checklist

- [ ] All files follow template structure
- [ ] Journey clearly defines problem and aha moment
- [ ] Tech stack choices are well-reasoned
- [ ] All outputs trace back to journey
- [ ] "What We DIDN'T Choose" sections are complete
- [ ] Examples are specific (not generic)
- [ ] README.md explains product and cascade decisions
- [ ] No sensitive information (no real user data, API keys, etc.)

## Submission Format

**Option 1: Pull Request (preferred)**
- Fork repository
- Add your example to `examples/[your-product-name]/`
- Submit PR with this issue number

**Option 2: Attached Files**
- Attach ZIP file with complete example
- We'll review and add to repository

## Additional Information

**Is this a real product?**
- [ ] Yes, in development
- [ ] Yes, launched
- [ ] No, hypothetical example

**Can we contact you with questions?**
- [ ] Yes, via GitHub
- [ ] Yes, via email: [your-email]
- [ ] No, this submission is self-explanatory

**Would you like to be credited?**
- [ ] Yes, as [name/username]
- [ ] No, anonymous contribution

**Thank you for contributing an example! This helps the entire Stack-Driven community.**
